action.action-desc: Mr. Byrne introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for more effective online education verification metrics.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Online Education Verification Act.

section.header: Requirement for secure login and passcode
section.text: Section 496(a)(4)(B)(ii) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1099b(a)(4)(B)(ii)) is amended by inserting after processes the following: , in addition to requiring a secure login and passcode for coursework on the Internet,.
